experiences.description:
Work with business stakeholders to translate business requirement into functional requirement.\W*Set up the Power BI database, design and develop all the custom metrics, reports and dashboards in Power BI to meet functional\W*requirements for the whole operation department by cooperating with IT team in Spain.\W*Clarify end user’s inquiry on reports’ features and functionalities, continuously optimize reports along with the developing
operating procedure.\W*Collect and consolidate data from different portals to prepare monthly and quarterly operational reports for upper management to\W*track enterprise level KPI.\W*Conduct analytical projects on massive datasets with tableau to analyze system operational constraints, deficiencies and defects,\W*collaborate with operation team and tech team to develop solutions.\W*Monitor and report on accurate transaction generation at the roadside, timely data transmission, data validation of transaction,\W*track and analyze system performance and operation performance.\W*Participate in the implementation and testing of Central Systems, track results and records and escalate system performance issues.
experiences.title: Operation Data Analyst

experiences.description: Extracted data from CRM system, created monthly reports based on different key performance indicators including customer\W*complaint code, complaint over 60 days and average complaint solving days.\W*Created and compared charts, tables and graphs, identified trends and occurrences.\W*Prepared advanced shipping notice by using electronic data interchange system, maintained data integrity of inventory system by\W*trouble shooting between Redtail and Microsoft GP.\W*Searched, extracted, managed and analyzed data in Microsoft Dynamics Great Plains system to support daily business process\W*and annual auditing.
experiences.title: Data and Billing Analyst

experiences.description: Performed ad-hoc reports of beauty advisors’ basic information for training and sales department.\W*Created monthly, quarterly, and yearly coaching reports for more than 200 beauty advisors from the whole China department\W*and presented it in PowerPoint in department meetings to improve beauty advisors’ selling skills.\W*Troubleshooted and analyzed reports using Excel (V lookup, pivot tables) to follow up beauty advisors’ performance every\W*season, helped training department to achieve higher efficiency on training beauty advisors’ selling skills by 15%.\W*Tracked and analyzed actual product using and ordering on a monthly basis, forecasted second year product ordering based on\W*the purchase price variance and budget variance.\W*Supported the creation of key door action plan, provided insight into the establishment of SKU sales target of each beauty\W*advisor.
experiences.title: FRESH Training Department Business Analyst Intern
